ISSUE.TITLE: Country and State drop down value disappear once affiliate edit from admin side
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go /Admin/Affiliate/Edit/1 2) Click save and continue you can see **country and state drop down** value vanished Now If you create new Affiliate than follow below steps to reproduce again this issue 1) Create new affiliate with relevant value /Admin/Affiliate/Create 2) Now edit same affiliate 3) remove text from County / region text box and click save 4) you can see same issue appeared. **country and state drop down value vanished**

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4456 Fixed Country and State drop down value disappearing when editing affiliate
